achievements.label: The King Descends from Heaven
achievements.descriptionLocked: In the name of the Undying Wick, I shall drive you back, Wolf.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'In the name of the Undying Wick, I shall drive you back, Wolf.' [Officer Clarion intimidates the Iron Eater.]

achievements.label: Century of Friendship
achievements.descriptionLocked: Minor historical disputes continue on this battlefield. May their friendship last forever.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'Minor historical disputes continue on this battlefield. May their friendship last forever.' [Officer Clarion is locked in combat with the Continental Enemy.]

achievements.label: Strife Continues
achievements.descriptionLocked: I didn't attain that position, but my friend and the New King have promised to fulfill my desire, so let the battle continue.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I didn't attain that position, but my friend and the New King have promised to fulfill my desire, so let the battle continue.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'I didn't attain that position, but my friend and the New King have promised to fulfill my desire, so let the battle continue.' [Following Officer Clarion.]

achievements.label: Reforging the Endgame
achievements.descriptionLocked: Together with the New Forces, we have liberated Rome! This is a historic moment!
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: Together with the New Forces, we have liberated Rome! This is a historic moment!
achievements.unlockMessage: 'Together with the New Forces, we have liberated Rome! This is a historic moment!' [In Rome, you assisted Officer Clarion in defeating Colonel Ilse.]

achievements.label: Fated Encounter
achievements.descriptionLocked: In this strand of history, you have forged a friendship.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: In this strand of history, you have forged a friendship.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'In this strand of history, you have forged a friendship.' [You have become acquainted with Officer Clarion.]

achievements.label: Proof of the Hanged Man
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>'Hail the New King!'<i>

[A certain writer once attempted to describe the greatness of the New King. After going through four revisions and three months of agonizing writing, 'Hail the New King!' became the only words she could utter.]
